articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow Futures Slip; Trump Hints at Tariff Relief for Automakers — Live Updates - WSJ
articles.description: Trump exempted many tech products from reciprocal tariffs, spurring a tech stock rally, but warned more-targeted duties are in the works. Follow along for live updates on the Dow, S&P 500 and Nasdaq.
articles.content:
The first signs of corporate collateral damage from the tariff turmoil are starting to hit.
Boeing stock fell premarket, after a report that Beijing has told Chinese airlines to stop taking delivery… [+1248 chars]

articles.title: CT scans could cause 5% of cancers, study finds; experts note uncertainty - Ars Technica
articles.description: The estimates are small and uncertain, but balancing risks and benefits is critical.

articles.title: Apple to Analyze User Data on Devices to Bolster AI Technology - Bloomberg
articles.description: Apple Inc. will begin analyzing data on customers’ devices in a bid to improve its artificial intelligence platform, a move designed to safeguard user information while still helping it catch up with AI rivals.
